channel.title: General Sick Movies Travel Weather on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: weird...
item.description: there is a thunderstorm outside. its november. wtf. i am sick. i haven’t gone out in awhile. i have slept a LOT. a whole LOT. and cleaned. and got really fast cable internet. DSL is lame. i am sad - cuz i really liked speakeasy. but they were too expensive and cable was so easy and damned damned fast. i peak at like 7000kbps. that shit is nuts. NUTS. we are about to start watching ong bak.
